bio:
Maya Yizhaky is a digital wellness teacher and an impact entrepreneur.

She teaches people how to take back control of their digital lives and establish a more intentional and beneficial relationship with their technology. Her Digital Zen Method uses practical digital decluttering and digital mindfulness techniques to help individuals and organizations declutter and organize their digital lives, improving the quality of how we live, work, and connect.

With a background in business and international development, Maya has extensive experience as a strategy consultant for multinational corporations, international development institutions, and technology start-ups. She holds a BA in International Trade & Business Strategy from the University of California, Berkeley, where she conducted award-winning research on the emergence of Social Venture Capital and Impact Investment.

She is also a certified Hatha Yoga Teacher, RYTÂ® 200 Yoga Alliance, and holds a Diploma In Yoga Education from the government of India.

| shortsummary:With a BA in International Trade & Business Strategy, she is an impact entrepreneur with a 7-figure media empire, mindful living coach and digital organization expert with extensive experience as a strategy consultant.
title: Impact entrepreneur, 7-figure media empire, mindfulness coach & digital organization expert; BA in International Trade & Business Strategy
